content: MQA-R Pipe clamp saddle Stainless steel pipe clamp saddle for connecting threaded components (imperial) to MQ strut channels ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick connection of threaded components to the open side of MQ strut channels Easy installation and positioning within MQ strut channel openings Single, compact part – for higher productivity and flexibility Various thread sizes available Applications Fastening pipes and air ducts Fastening cable trays and cable baskets ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Nut: 1.4581 (A4) - DIN EN 10283, Plate: 1.4404 (A4) – EN 10088, AISI 316L, Plastic: PB Surface finish: Outdoor Plus - Stainless Steel Environmental conditions: Outdoor high pollution (C4 – high / C5) Technical Data | Material composition | Nut: 1.4581 (A4) - DIN EN 10283, Plate: 1.4404 (A4) – EN 10088, AISI 316L, Plastic: PB | Surface finish | Outdoor Plus - Stainless Steel | Environmental conditions | Outdoor high pollution (C4 – high / C5) ### ITEMS- 401399 - Saddle nut MQA-F 1/2-R SS316 - Package Size 25 pc - 401397 - Saddle nut MQA-F 1/4-R SS316 - Package Size 25 pc - 401398 - Saddle nut MQA-F 3/8-R SS316 - Package Size 25 pc
